author: daxian-dbw
body:
Update the help text for 'pwsh /?' with the new name 'pwsh'
This is how it looks now:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/127450/31834101-b878d0ce-b581-11e7-9733-cf0d2c71a1d0.png)


**NOTE:** We need to update the help content for 'Get-Help' too. I have opened issue #5181 to track that effort.
title: Update the help text for 'pwsh /?' with the new name 'pwsh'
